Description: Yanbu National Petrochemicals (known as: Yansab) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since February 2006. Yansab operates within the Materials sector focusing on Commodity Chemicals. Yansab is based in Yanbu, Saudi Arabia and was established in February 2006.
